dct_title_s: A map of South America with all the European settlements & whatever else is remarkable from the latest & best observations
dct_description_sm: Prime meridian: London Pictorial relief. Shows boundaries, mines, etc. Probably issued in: Rapin de Thoyras, Paul. The history of England, translated by N. Tindal. London, 1745. v. 4.
